sentences.en: A contact with a lightning calculator inspired him to study mathematics.
sentences.cn: 同快速计算器的一次接触,激励他去研究数学.

sentences.en: A pocket calculator only works to eight decimal places.
sentences.cn: 袖珍计算器只能计算到小数点后8位数。

sentences.en: Cross - check your answer by using a calculator.
sentences.cn: 用计算器核对一下你的答案.

sentences.en: Cross-check your answers with a calculator.
sentences.cn: 用计算器核对一下你的答案。

sentences.en: Don't forget to bring your calculator that day .
sentences.cn: 那天你可别忘了带计算器。

sentences.en: He wonders why the digits on his calculator slope to the right.
sentences.cn: 他不明白为什么他的计算器上面的数字向右倾斜。

sentences.en: I found a surplus store and bought a pocket calculator.
sentences.cn: 我找到一家出售剩余物品的商店,买了一台袖珍计算器.

sentences.en: I totaled my expenses with a calculator.
sentences.cn: 我用计算器算出开支的总金额.

sentences.en: My bank manager furrowed his brow, fingered his calculator and finally pronounced "Aha!"
sentences.cn: 我的银行经理眉头紧锁，拨弄着计算器，最后终于“啊哈!”了一声。

sentences.en: On a calculator, the display or printing of an interim result of a calculation.
sentences.cn: 在计算器上, 显示或打印运算的中间结果.

sentences.en: The calculator is a tool, not a crutch; yet it is increasingly being used as a crutch by many children.
sentences.cn: 计算器是工具，不是拐杖，可是现在很多孩子越来越依赖它。

sentences.en: This pocket calculator needs two batteries.
sentences.cn: 这个袖珍计算器需用两节乾电池.

sentences.en: We conclude that hand - held electronic calculator sales should be approximately 446,600, 000 units by 1979.
sentences.cn: 我们推测出,1979年袖珍计算器的销售量大约为446,600, 000只.

words.tran_cn: 可计算的；能预测的；可靠的
计算出的；适合的；有计划的
计算的；深谋远虑的；审慎的
计算的，善于计算的；精明的
计算；估计；计算的结果；深思熟虑
计算；估计；打算（calculate的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 袖珍计算器；便携式计算器

trans.tran_en: a small electronic machine that can add, multiply etc
